title: Put this 2 Bedroom on your to-see list! You'll be glad you did!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Spring Lake Apartments!', '7000 Southlake Pkwy Morrow, GA 30260', 'Rental Size:', '2 BR - 2 BA - 1158 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1744 |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, Georgia.', "The living spaces at Spring Lake are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'Please call our community for complete pet', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY',
